A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't get all the hate from trolls online. It's an amazing film\, with great action\, great performances\, and lots of surprises. There's no pleasing the whiny fanboys\, they complained about the prequels for not being like the Original Trilogy\, they complained about Force Awakens/Rogue One for being too similar to the Original Trilogy\, now they complain about The Last Jedi for being too different. Those morons should just go home and watch the Original Trilogy for the rest of their lives\, you clearly won't be satisfied with anything else.
